item.title: Trivia-l Recommendations
item.description: We hear snippets of information and we read bits and pieces of them. Are there broader documentations with context?

item.title: What is Bangalore Reading?
item.description: Lists of books currently being read by Bangalore’s readers - Did they love them? Did they hate them? Did they finish them? :)
